verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> not <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel, for joy <S%H1524><s%>, as other people <S%H5971><s%>: for you have gone a whoring <S%H2181><s%> from your God <S%H430><s%>, you have loved <S%H157><s%> a reward <S%H868><s%> upon every cornfloor <S%H1637><s%>.
The floor <S%H1637><s%> and the winepress <S%H3342><s%> shall not feed <S%H7462><s%> them <S%H8492><s%>, and the new wine shall fail in her <S%H3584><s%>.

They shall not live <S%H3427><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s land <S%H776><s%>; but Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> things in Assyria <S%H804><s%>.

They shall not offer <S%H5258><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> offerings to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, neither shall they be pleasing <S%H6149><s%> unto him <S%H2077><s%>: their sacrifices shall be unto them as the bread <S%H3899><s%> of mourners <S%H205><s%>; all that eat <S%H398><s%> there shall be polluted <S%H2930><s%>: for their bread <S%H3899><s%> for their soul <S%H5315><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
What will you do <S%H6213><s%> in the solemn <S%H4150><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?

For <S%H1980><s%>, behold, they are gone because of destruction <S%H7701><s%>: Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall gather them up <S%H6908><s%>, Memphis <S%H4644><s%> shall bury <S%H6912><s%> them <S%H4261><s%>: the pleasant places for their silver <S%H3701><s%>, nettles <S%H7057><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> them <S%H2336><s%>: thorns shall be in their tabernacles <S%H168><s%>.

The days <S%H3117><s%> of visitation <S%H6486><s%> are come <S%H935><s%>, the days <S%H3117><s%> of recompense <S%H7966><s%> are come <S%H935><s%>; Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> it <S%H5030><s%>: the prophet is a fool <S%H191><s%>, the spiritual <S%H7307><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is mad <S%H7696><s%>, for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and the great <S%H7227><s%> hatred <S%H4895><s%>.

The watchman <S%H6822><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> was with my God <S%H430><s%>: but the prophet <S%H5030><s%> is a snare <S%H6341><s%> of a fowler <S%H3352><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and hatred <S%H4895><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%>.

They have deeply <S%H6009><s%> corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves <S%H3117><s%>, as in the days of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%>: therefore he will remember <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, he will visit <S%H6485><s%> their sins <S%H2403><s%>.

I found <S%H4672><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like grapes <S%H6025><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; I saw <S%H7200><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> as the firstripe <S%H1063><s%> in the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> at her first time <S%H7225><s%>: but they went <S%H935><s%> to Baal <S%H1187><s%>â€“peor, and separated <S%H5144><s%> themselves unto that shame <S%H1322><s%>; and their abominations <S%H8251><s%> were according as they loved <S%H157><s%>.

As for Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, their glory <S%H3519><s%> shall fly away <S%H5774><s%> like a bird <S%H5775><s%>, from the birth <S%H3205><s%>, and from the womb <S%H990><s%>, and from the conception <S%H2032><s%>.

Though they bring up <S%H1431><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%>, yet will I bereave <S%H7921><s%> them <S%H120><s%>, that there shall not be a man left <S%H188><s%>: Yes, woe also to them when I depart from them <S%H5493><s%>!

Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, as I saw <S%H7200><s%> Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>, is planted <S%H8362><s%> in a pleasant place <S%H5116><s%>: but Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> to the murderer <S%H2026><s%>.
Give <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord: what will you give <S%H5414><s%>? give <S%H5414><s%> them a miscarrying <S%H7921><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> and dry <S%H6784><s%> breasts <S%H7699><s%>.

All their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>: for there I hated <S%H8130><s%> them <S%H7455><s%>: for the wickedness of their doings <S%H4611><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%>, I will love <S%H160><s%> them no more <S%H3254><s%>: all their princes <S%H8269><s%> are revolters <S%H5637><s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is struck <S%H5221><s%>, their root <S%H8328><s%> is dried up <S%H3001><s%>, they shall carry <S%H6213><s%> no fruit <S%H6529><s%>: Yes <S%H3205><s%>, though they bring forth, yet will I kill <S%H4191><s%> even the beloved <S%H4261><s%> fruit of their womb <S%H990><s%>.
My God <S%H430><s%> will cast them away <S%H3988><s%>, because they did not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto him <S%H5074><s%>: and they shall be wanderers among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
